npc.name: Francis Fiddlestick
npc.msg:
Welcome, traveler, to the town of Rho Gliec.
				Would you by any chance have a pan cleaner? My food
				has unfortunately come out charcoal black as of late...
				Oh! My name is Francis Fiddlestick.
				Uh, watch out for the elves, they're nasty foes.

npc.name: Phil von Phylum
npc.msg:
Weeeeeelcome! HAHAHA! My name is Phil,
				Phil Phylum! I just looove salad. Have you heard
				of the maneating plants around here? They're vicious,
				but make a very tasty addition to a good salad if
				dressed right...

npc.name: Rowena Mandelbrot
npc.msg:
Well aren't you a brave soul!
				You must be brave to come here, what with all
				the terrible beasts which roam around. If you're
				feeling extra brave, go seek the King of the Goblins,
				he has a mighty suit of armour with him.

npc.name: Xac Unix
npc.msg:
Congratulations on making it this far. Although I doubt you'll
				get much farther. [Laughs humourlessly] There's a cave up ahead,
				one of those places where you never see those who go in come out.
				Good luck, although you'll likely need a miracle. Or perhaps a set
				of cyan armour...
